name: 3D Tic-Tac-Toe (Persephone's Chair)
description:
3D Tic-Tac-Toe is a classic board game with a twist.

It is game #5 of my "12 Games in 12 Months" project. You can follow my journey via the links below. See the video in the sidebar for the devlog on the process of making this game.

Contact
